trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: CatalogZoneDesigner provides design-time rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> controls.
trans-unit.target: CatalogZoneDesigner 提供設計階段呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: It includes support for editable designer regions, templates, and auto-formats to allow a page developer to easily alter the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括可編輯的設計工具區域、 範本及自動格式設定可讓網頁開發人員輕鬆地變更控制項的外觀的支援。

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collections provide quick formatting options for the page developer and can be safely overridden to change the default appearance of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 公用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>集合提供快速的網頁開發人員的格式化選項，就可以安全地覆寫變更為自訂控制項的預設外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner"></xref> class
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner"></xref>類別

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得之預先定義的自動格式化配置集合中顯示**自動格式化**在設計階段的相關聯控制項的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to return a collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 自動格式設定屬性覆寫其基底實作，以傳回集合的特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: A pre-specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default CatalogZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: 預先指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref>與預設 CatalogZone 配置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a null argument.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來代表控制項設計階段，藉由呼叫的標記<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用 null 引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: A method call to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with a null argument as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用 null 引數做為參數。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> in the designer before generating the design-time HTML of the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>之前產生的控制項設計階段 HTML 設計工具中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>, if any, associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref>，如果有與控制項相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the design-time HTML of the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>代表控制項的設計階段 HTML。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the content for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the persisted form of the designer region's content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示之永久的格式的設計工具區域的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup to represent an empty control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示空控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 將設計工具繫結至相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Sets the content of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the content to go in the specified region.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，代表要在指定的區域的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
trans-unit.target: 取得範本群組集合各包含一個或多個範本定義。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to return a collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> class.
trans-unit.target: TemplateGroups 屬性會覆寫其基底實作，以傳回集合的特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: A pre-specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> with default settings for a CatalogZone environment.
trans-unit.target: 預先指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> CatalogZone 環境的預設設定。
